website_details.website_structure: Modern React/JavaScript app - likely dynamic content loading

hardcoded_sample_properties.title: Lakefront Mountain Retreat
hardcoded_sample_properties.address: 123 Deep Creek Lake Dr, McHenry, MD 21541
hardcoded_sample_properties.description: Stunning lakefront property with private dock access and panoramic mountain views. Perfect for year-round living or vacation rental.

hardcoded_sample_properties.title: Ski-In/Ski-Out Condo
hardcoded_sample_properties.description: Modern condo with direct ski slope access at Wisp Resort. Fully furnished and ready for mountain adventures.

hardcoded_sample_properties.title: Mountain View Family Home
hardcoded_sample_properties.description: Spacious family home with breathtaking mountain views and large yard. Great for full-time residence in beautiful Garrett County.

hardcoded_sample_properties.title: Lake Access Cabin
hardcoded_sample_properties.description: Cozy cabin with lake access and hiking trails nearby. Perfect weekend getaway in the heart of nature.

hardcoded_sample_properties.title: Luxury Mountain Estate
hardcoded_sample_properties.address: 654 Summit Ridge Dr, Terra Alta, WV 26764
hardcoded_sample_properties.description: Impressive luxury estate with premium finishes, multiple fireplaces, and expansive mountain views from every room.

likely_issues: Railey.com website structure may have changed
Regex pattern may not match current HTML structure
Website may require authentication or have anti-scraping measures

recommendations.immediate: Add detailed logging to see what HTML is actually being returned from Railey.com
recommendations.debug: Log the actual HTML response to understand website structure
recommendations.alternative: Consider using a real estate API like RentSpree, MLSGrid, or Bridge Interactive instead of scraping
recommendations.fallback: If scraping fails, clearly indicate to users that sample data is being shown
